statements: SELECT * FROM customer_surveys;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_score FROM customer_surveys;
SELECT survey_id, customer_name, satisfaction_score, feedback FROM customer_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_surveys WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT survey_id, customer_name, satisfaction_score FROM customer_surveys ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 7 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_name, satisfaction_score FROM customer_surveys WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback FROM customer_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score < 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_surveys WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL AND survey_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT MAX(satisfaction_score) AS highest_satisfaction_score, MIN(satisfaction_score) AS lowest_satisfaction_score FROM customer_surveys;
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE loyalty_level = 3;
SELECT survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM surveys WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE total_purchases < 10;
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 80 ORDER BY survey_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_level FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE satisfaction_score < 50 ORDER BY survey_id DESC
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases, loyalty_level FROM customers WHERE total_purchases BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY loyalty_level ASC
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_survey;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_score FROM customer_survey WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT survey_id, customer_name, satisfaction_score, survey_timestamp FROM customer_survey ORDER BY survey_timestamp DESC;
SELECT question_text FROM survey_questions WHERE question_id = 2;
SELECT survey_id, response_value FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1 AND response_value = 'Agree';
SELECT * FROM customer_survey WHERE satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_score, survey_timestamp FROM customer_survey ORDER BY survey_timestamp DESC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_name FROM customer_survey WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND satisfaction_score < 3 ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT q.question_text, r.response_value FROM survey_questions q JOIN survey_responses r ON q.question_id = r.question_id WHERE r.response_value = 'Yes';

SELECT c.customer_name, s.satisfaction_score, r.response_value FROM customer_survey c JOIN survey_responses r ON c.survey_id = r.survey_id JOIN survey_questions q ON r.question_id = q.question_id ORDER BY c.satisfaction_score DESC, r.response_value ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customer;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date, survey_rating FROM Survey ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM Survey_Question WHERE question_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT response_id, survey_id, question_id, response_text FROM Survey_Response WHERE survey_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Customer INNER JOIN Survey ON Customer.customer_id = Survey.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT survey_date, survey_rating FROM Survey ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT Customer.customer_name, Survey.survey_date, Survey.survey_rating FROM Customer INNER JOIN Survey ON Customer.customer_id = Survey.customer_id WHERE Survey.survey_rating > 3;

SELECT Survey_Question.question_text, Survey_Response.response_text FROM Survey_Question INNER JOIN Survey_Response ON Survey_Question.question_id = Survey_Response.question_id WHERE Survey_Response.response_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM Survey WHERE survey_id = 2;
SELECT question_text, survey_id FROM Question WHERE survey_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT response_text, customer_id FROM Response WHERE response_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM Survey WHERE survey_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT question_text, survey_id FROM Question WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Response WHERE customer_id = 100 AND response_id IN (SELECT response_id FROM SatisfactionScore WHERE score_value > 3);
